mapper.select: select board_num, board_name, board_pass, board_subject, board_content, board_file, board_re_ref, board_re_lev, board_re_seq, board_readcount, board_date from (select row_number() over(order by board_re_ref desc, board_re_seq asc) as num, A.* from board A order by board_re_ref desc, board_re_seq asc) B where num between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+10
mapper.update: update board set board_readcount=board_readcount+1 where board_num=#{boardNum}
mapper.select: select board_pass from board where board_num=#{boardNum}
mapper.update: update board set board_subject=#{board_subject}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_num=#{board_num}
update board set board_re_seq=board_re_seq+1 where board_re_ref=#{board_re_ref} and board_re_seq > #{board_re_seq}
